title: Stadia 4.13 preps game-specific touch controls, possible 1440p mobile streaming
content:
The latest update to the Stadia app, version 4.13, points to game-specific touchscreen controls and hints at 1440p streaming on Android.

description: The latest update to the Stadia app, version 4.13, points to game-specific touchscreen controls and hints at 1440p streaming on Android.
